channel.title: Recovery 101 Radio
channel.description:
A Recovery Show That Used To Suffer From Insanity, Now We Enjoy It...
recovery_101@hotmail.com
channel.itunes:subtitle: Insanity in recovery!
channel.itunes:author: Recovery 101
channel.itunes:summary:
A Recovery Show That Used To Suffer From Insanity, Now We Enjoy It...
recovery_101@hotmail.com

item.title: Using Dreams
item.description:
Recovery 101 Radio is a recovery radio program based loosely on 12 step recovery programs. The format is less like a meeting and more like going to coffee afterward. The "Meeting AFTER the meeting" as it were.
This episode we join Bruce, Shelly, and guest host Marty as they broadcast from the world famous Laguna Beach studio! We join them as they discuss their normal 15 minutes of crap mixed with 15 minutes of recovery!
This episode we talk about using dreams! Are they freebies? Do the freak you out? Do you have to check to make sure that you're still clean and sober? What do YOU think? See what WE think! The Boozy Newz and all the other crap you've come to love or hate!
Get the "I Used To Suffer From Insanity...But Now I ENJOY It" shirts available at http://cafepress.com/recovery_101. The videos are at http://youtube.com/easylook and http://youtube.com/recovery101rule62 ...And Of Course All The Other Insanity You've Come To Expect! Email us suggestions of topics, rants, raves, and whatever you want to recovery_101@hotmail.com, recovery101radio@gmail.com, or recovery101radio@hotmail.com.
That's right folks another show brimming over with recovery!
Remember we used to SUFFER from Insanity and Now We ENJOY It!

The New Way Foundation (NWF)- Since 1967 the NWF has provided these valuable services to more than 25,000 individuals in Burbank and the greater Los Angeles area. Our goal is to provide compassionate effective care at an affordable cost to those who are tired of their old way of life and desire a new way of life. We know how to help the suffering individual who is desperate and willing to learn to apply the proven tools of our recovery program. Click the banner to visit their website!



For Information Call Us: (818)842-9416

Check Out The 12 Step Gazette! It's live NOW!



Check out the Recovery 101 Band of the month...Loose Chains!



Donate To Recovery 101!

item.title: Only Two Rules
item.description:
Recovery 101 Radio is a recovery radio program based loosely on 12 step recovery programs. The format is less like a meeting and more like going to coffee afterward. The "Meeting AFTER the meeting" as it were.
This episode we join Bruce, Shelly, and guest host Marty as they broadcast from the world famous Laguna Beach studio! We join them as they discuss their normal 15 minutes of crap mixed with 15 minutes of recovery!
This episode we talk about the only two rules! Rule 1: Don't sweat the small stuff. Rule 2: It's ALL small stuff. What do YOU think? See what WE think! The Boozy Newz and all the other crap you've come to love or hate!
Get the "I Used To Suffer From Insanity...But Now I ENJOY It" shirts available at http://cafepress.com/recovery_101. The videos are at http://youtube.com/easylook and http://youtube.com/recovery101rule62 ...And Of Course All The Other Insanity You've Come To Expect! Email us suggestions of topics, rants, raves, and whatever you want to recovery_101@hotmail.com, recovery101radio@gmail.com, or recovery101radio@hotmail.com.
That's right folks another show brimming over with recovery!
Remember we used to SUFFER from Insanity and Now We ENJOY It!

The New Way Foundation (NWF)- Since 1967 the NWF has provided these valuable services to more than 25,000 individuals in Burbank and the greater Los Angeles area. Our goal is to provide compassionate effective care at an affordable cost to those who are tired of their old way of life and desire a new way of life. We know how to help the suffering individual who is desperate and willing to learn to apply the proven tools of our recovery program. Click the banner to visit their website!



For Information Call Us: (818)842-9416

item.title: Your Recovery Date
item.description:
Recovery 101 Radio is a recovery radio program based loosely on 12 step recovery programs. The format is less like a meeting and more like going to coffee afterward. The "Meeting AFTER the meeting" as it were.
This episode we join Bruce, Shelly, and guest host Marty as they broadcast from the world famous Laguna Beach studio! We join them as they discuss their normal 15 minutes of crap mixed with 15 minutes of recovery!
This episode we talk about your recovery date! What about people that don't know when their recovery date is? Not so much in the which DAY you got clean and sober...but aren't even sure how many YEARS they have! What do YOU think? See what WE think! The Boozy Newz and all the other crap you've come to love or hate!
Get the "I Used To Suffer From Insanity...But Now I ENJOY It" shirts available at http://cafepress.com/recovery_101. The videos are at http://youtube.com/easylook and http://youtube.com/recovery101rule62 ...And Of Course All The Other Insanity You've Come To Expect! item.title: Tough Love
item.description:
Recovery 101 Radio is a recovery radio program based loosely on 12 step recovery programs. The format is less like a meeting and more like going to coffee afterward. The "Meeting AFTER the meeting" as it were.
This episode we join Bruce, Shelly, and guest host Marty as they broadcast from the world famous Laguna Beach studio! We join them as they discuss their normal 15 minutes of crap mixed with 15 minutes of recovery!
This episode we talk about tough love! When sober folk go bad....what do you do? We think show some tough love is in order! What do YOU think? See what WE think! The Boozy Newz and all the other crap you've come to love or hate!

item.title: Attitude
item.description:
Recovery 101 Radio is a recovery radio program based loosely on 12 step recovery programs. The format is less like a meeting and more like going to coffee afterward. The "Meeting AFTER the meeting" as it were.
This episode we join Bruce, Shelly, and guest host Marty as they broadcast from the world famous Laguna Beach studio! We join them as they discuss their normal 15 minutes of crap mixed with 15 minutes of recovery!
This episode we talk about attitude! Do YOU have the right attitude in regards to your recovery? Do WE? How about an attitude of gratitude? How about other people with bad attitudes? What do YOU think? See what WE think! The Boozy Newz and all the other crap you've come to love or hate!
Get the "I Used To Suffer From Insanity...But Now I ENJOY It" shirts available at http://cafepress.com/recovery_101. item.title: Anonymity
item.description:
Recovery 101 Radio is a recovery radio program based loosely on 12 step recovery programs. The format is less like a meeting and more like going to coffee afterward. The "Meeting AFTER the meeting" as it were.
This episode we join Bruce, Shelly, and guest host Marty as they broadcast from the world famous Laguna Beach studio! We join them as they discuss their normal 15 minutes of crap mixed with 15 minutes of recovery!
This episode we talk about anonymity! The spiritual foundation of all our traditions! This could be the MOST important feature of the program! We're talking about a bunch of different types of anonymity! What do YOU think? See what WE think! The Boozy Newz and all the other crap you've come to love or hate!
Get the "I Used To Suffer From Insanity...But Now I ENJOY It" shirts available at http://cafepress.com/recovery_101. The videos are at http://youtube.com/easylook and http://youtube.com/recovery101rule62 ...And Of Course All The Other Insanity You've Come To Expect! That's right folks another show brimming over with recovery!
Remember we used to SUFFER from Insanity and Now We ENJOY It!

The New Way Foundation (NWF)- Since 1967 the NWF has provided these valuable services to more than 25,000 individuals in Burbank and the greater Los Angeles area. Our goal is to provide compassionate effective care at an affordable cost to those who are tired of their old way of life and desire a new way of life. We know how to help the suffering individual who is desperate and willing to learn to apply the proven tools of our recovery program. Click the banner to visit their website!

item.title: Trust
item.description:
Recovery 101 Radio is a recovery radio program based loosely on 12 step recovery programs. The format is less like a meeting and more like going to coffee afterward. The "Meeting AFTER the meeting" as it were.
This episode we join Bruce, Shelly, and guest host Marty as they broadcast from the world famous Laguna Beach studio! We join them as they discuss their normal 15 minutes of crap mixed with 15 minutes of recovery!
This episode we talk about trust! You never abused any trust did you? How long does it take to get that back? What do YOU think? See what WE think! The Boozy Newz and all the other crap you've come to love or hate!

item.title: Genetics
item.description:
Recovery 101 Radio is a recovery radio program based loosely on 12 step recovery programs. The format is less like a meeting and more like going to coffee afterward. The "Meeting AFTER the meeting" as it were.
This episode we join Bruce, Shelly, and guest host Marty as they broadcast from the world famous Laguna Beach studio! We join them as they discuss their normal 15 minutes of crap mixed with 15 minutes of recovery!
This episode we talk about genetics! Is alcoholism and addiction genetic or environmental, or a combination of the two? What do YOU think? See what WE think! The Boozy Newz and all the other crap you've come to love or hate!

This episode we join Bruce, Shelly, and guest host Marty as they broadcast from the world famous Laguna Beach studio! We join them as they discuss their normal 15 minutes of crap mixed with 15 minutes of recovery!
This episode we talk about jealousy! The green eyed monster! How about jealousy within the program? What do YOU think? See what WE think! The Boozy Newz and all the other crap you've come to love or hate!

Our goal is to provide compassionate effective care at an affordable cost to those who are tired of their old way of life and desire a new way of life. item.title: Welcome Back
item.description:
Recovery 101 Radio is a recovery radio program based loosely on 12 step recovery programs. The format is less like a meeting and more like going to coffee afterward. The "Meeting AFTER the meeting" as it were.
This episode we join Bruce, Shelly, and guest host Marty as they broadcast from the world famous Laguna Beach studio! We join them as they discuss their normal 15 minutes of crap mixed with 15 minutes of recovery!
This episode we talk about welcoming people back! If someone has gone out do YOU welcome them back to the fellowship? Do WE? What do YOU think? See what WE think! The Boozy Newz and all the other crap you've come to love or hate!

item.title: Switching Addictions
item.description:
Recovery 101 Radio is a recovery radio program based loosely on 12 step recovery programs. The format is less like a meeting and more like going to coffee afterward. The "Meeting AFTER the meeting" as it were.

This episode we talk about switching addictions! Do people really switch addictions? Sex? Gaming? Facebook? How do WE? What do YOU think? See what WE think! The Boozy Newz and all the other crap you've come to love or hate!

item.title: Marijuana Maintenance
item.description:
Recovery 101 Radio is a recovery radio program based loosely on 12 step recovery programs. The format is less like a meeting and more like going to coffee afterward. The "Meeting AFTER the meeting" as it were.
This episode we join Bruce, Shelly, and guest host Marty as they broadcast from the world famous Laguna Beach studio! We join them as they discuss their normal 15 minutes of crap mixed with 15 minutes of recovery!
This episode we talk about marijuana maintenance! Does THAT work? Ehhhhhhh...don't think so! What if something like weed is prescribed for a reason...are you still sober? What is OK and not OK in recovery? What do YOU think? See what WE think! The Boozy Newz and all the other crap you've come to love or hate!

item.dc:creator: Recovery 101
item.itunes:summary:
Recovery 101 Radio is a recovery radio program based loosely on 12 step recovery programs. The format is less like a meeting and more like going to coffee afterward. The "Meeting AFTER the meeting" as it were. This episode we join Bruce, Shelly, and guest host Marty as they broadcast from the world famous Laguna Beach studio! We join them as they discuss their normal 15 minutes of crap mixed with 15 minutes of recovery! This episode we talk about picking a sponsor! Hear how we would and have picked sponsors! What do YOU think? See what WE think! The Boozy Newz and all the other crap you've come to love or hate!
Get the "I Used To Suffer From Insanity...But Now I ENJOY It" shirts available at http://cafepress.com/recovery_101. The videos are at http://youtube.com/easylook and http://youtube.com/recovery101rule62 ...And Of Course All The Other Insanity You've Come To Expect! Email us suggestions of topics, rants, raves, and whatever you want to recovery_101@hotmail.com, recovery101radio@gmail.com, or recovery101radio@hotmail.com. That's right folks another show brimming over with recovery! Remember we used to SUFFER from Insanity and Now We ENJOY It! The New Way Foundation (NWF)- Since 1967 the NWF has provided these valuable services to more than 25,000 individuals in Burbank and the greater Los Angeles area. Our goal is to provide compassionate effective care at an affordable cost to those who are tired of their old way of life and desire a new way of life. We know how to help the suffering individual who is desperate and willing to learn to apply the proven tools of our recovery program. Click the banner to visit their website!For Information Call Us: (818)842-9416 Check Out The 12 Step Gazette! It's live NOW!
Check out the Recovery 101 Band of the month...Loose Chains! Donate To Recovery 101!

item.title: You'd Drink Too...
item.description:
Recovery 101 Radio is a recovery radio program based loosely on 12 step recovery programs. The format is less like a meeting and more like going to coffee afterward. The "Meeting AFTER the meeting" as it were.
This episode we join Bruce, Shelly, and Mark as they broadcast from the world famous Laguna Beach studio! We join them as they discuss their normal 15 minutes of crap mixed with 15 minutes of recovery!
This episode we talk about people saying "You'd Drink Too...if you had MY problems..." Have you ever heard THAT one before? Like there's a good reason to actually get loaded. What do YOU think? See what WE think! The Boozy Newz and all the other crap you've come to love or hate!
Get the "I Used To Suffer From Insanity...But Now I ENJOY It" shirts available at http://cafepress.com/recovery_101. The videos are at http://youtube.com/easylook and http://youtube.com/recovery101rule62 ...And Of Course All The Other Insanity You've Come To Expect! Email us suggestions of topics, rants, raves, and whatever you want to recovery_101@hotmail.com, recovery101radio@gmail.com, or recovery101radio@hotmail.com.
That's right folks another show brimming over with recovery!
Remember we used to SUFFER from Insanity and Now We ENJOY It!

The New Way Foundation (NWF)- Since 1967 the NWF has provided these valuable services to more than 25,000 individuals in Burbank and the greater Los Angeles area. Our goal is to provide compassionate effective care at an affordable cost to those who are tired of their old way of life and desire a new way of life. We know how to help the suffering individual who is desperate and willing to learn to apply the proven tools of our recovery program. Click the banner to visit their website!



For Information Call Us: (818)842-9416

Check Out The 12 Step Gazette! It's live NOW!



Check out the Recovery 101 Band of the month...Loose Chains!



Donate To Recovery 101!

item.title: Hit On At Meetings
item.description:
Recovery 101 Radio is a recovery radio program based loosely on 12 step recovery programs. The format is less like a meeting and more like going to coffee afterward. The "Meeting AFTER the meeting" as it were.
This episode we join Bruce, Shelly, and Mark as they broadcast from the world famous Laguna Beach studio! We join them as they discuss their normal 15 minutes of crap mixed with 15 minutes of recovery!
This episode we talk about being hit on at meetings! Is that EVER ok? What if the hittees aren't newcomers? Does that even matter? What do YOU think? See what WE think! The Boozy Newz and all the other crap you've come to love or hate!
Get the "I Used To Suffer From Insanity...But Now I ENJOY It" shirts available at http://cafepress.com/recovery_101. item.title: I Think I'm An Addict
item.description:
Recovery 101 Radio is a recovery radio program based loosely on 12 step recovery programs. The format is less like a meeting and more like going to coffee afterward. The "Meeting AFTER the meeting" as it were.
This episode we join Bruce, Shelly, and Mark as they broadcast from the world famous Laguna Beach studio! We join them as they discuss their normal 15 minutes of crap mixed with 15 minutes of recovery!
This episode we talk about when people THINK they're an addict! How about these people that sit and meetings and say that they might be an addict...or they might be an alcoholic. Like they somehow got to recovery on accident. What do YOU think? See what WE think! The Boozy Newz and all the other crap you've come to love or hate!
Get the "I Used To Suffer From Insanity...But Now I ENJOY It" shirts available at http://cafepress.com/recovery_101. The videos are at http://youtube.com/easylook and http://youtube.com/recovery101rule62 ...And Of Course All The Other Insanity You've Come To Expect! Email us suggestions of topics, rants, raves, and whatever you want to recovery_101@hotmail.com, recovery101radio@gmail.com, or recovery101radio@hotmail.com.
That's right folks another show brimming over with recovery!
Remember we used to SUFFER from Insanity and Now We ENJOY It!

The New Way Foundation (NWF)- Since 1967 the NWF has provided these valuable services to more than 25,000 individuals in Burbank and the greater Los Angeles area. Our goal is to provide compassionate effective care at an affordable cost to those who are tired of their old way of life and desire a new way of life.
